DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy safety meloxicam 7.5mg daily compare diclofenac 100mg SR daily treatment period 8 week
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy Safety Meloxicam vs. Diclofenac SR Patients With Osteoarthritis Knee
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis knee require therapy nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs )
